alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 2:36AM MST until December 27 at 8:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: .A clipper system will shift north of the area this morning. In its wake, breezy winds and bitterly cold temperatures will produce some areas of blowing snow and will allow wind chill readings to fall to 25 to 35 below zero through the early morning hours. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Areas of blowing snow, winds gusting as high as 40 mph, and bitterly cold wind chills. * WHERE...Harding County, Butte County, Perkins County, Ziebach County and the Northern Meade County Plains. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Ziebach
